bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for AC High Voltage Generator Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis
Amendment 1: Supplement for Use with Generators Rated 10-100 MVA
IEEE Standard for AC High Voltage Generator Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis - Amendment 1: Supplement for Use with Generators Rated 10-100 MVA
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.013a-2007 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.013-1997)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment includes special requirements better suited for generator circuit breakers used to protect smaller generators rated between 10 MVA and 50 MVA and between 50 MVA and 100 MVA. It is important because the existing standards for typical distribution circuit breakers specifically exclude generator circuit breakers from the scope.

This amendment includes special requirements better suited for generator circuit breakers used to protect smaller generators rated between 10 MVA and 50 MVA and between 50 MVA and 100 MVA. It is important because the existing standards for typical distribution circuit breakers specifically exclude generator circuit breakers from the scope.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
